abilities.name: Inner Fire
abilities.description: Huskar pushes nearby enemies away, dealing damage and silencing them.
abilities.notes: Health Cost: 75/100/125/150. With Aghanim's Shard, adds movement speed slow and heals Huskar based on damage dealt.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with each attack. Multiple hits stack. Each use costs Huskar a percentage of his current health.
abilities.notes: Can be set to autocast. Health Cost: 4% of current health per attack.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.description: Huskar's perseverance in battle increases as his health gets lower, granting increased attack speed and magic resistance.
abilities.notes: Attack speed and magic resistance increase as health decreases.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description: Huskar hurls himself at an enemy hero, dealing a percentage of their current health in damage while sacrificing a percentage of his own. While charging, Huskar is debuff immune.
abilities.notes: Health Cost: 32%/38%/44% of current health. Aghanim's Scepter increases cast range and adds a taunt effect.

innate_abilities.name: Blood Magic
innate_abilities.description: Huskar's mana is permanently replaced by health costs, which are treated as magical damage.
innate_abilities.notes: All of Huskar's abilities cost health instead of mana.
